system.description: Evil often does its work at night, and its work often lasts till cockcrow. But if this cock were to speak early, the plans might be unfinished – and so, this spell immediately calls the dawn’s messenger, and with it sunrise. It is a real miracle, but should only be used by those who are sure of its usefulness: for every hour miraculously received, the Cleric must later sleep an entire week; and if the spell was used for an evil purpose, so many years.
